title: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: When using the SaveAs feature, the file type is not remembered correctly. Additionally, the icon has changed from the parent Java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing Java file.
2) Make modifications to the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save icon.
4) A dialog will appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Type the filename without including the extension, as it is not requested.
7) Click Ok.

Observed Behavior:
The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but the file extension is not displayed.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file, unless explicitly changed during the SaveAs operation.
